data.text: @BroxiShona @RangersFC @G_Armstrong21 Great story, really connect with Azzy over time👌🏻. Didn’t really put it down for the 2 days it took me
@G_Armstrong21 @RangersFC Thanks! Brilliant to think that the places you mention in the book are literally on my doorstep and it's from the same time I was at school 😅
@BroxiShona @RangersFC Thank you buddy! Hope you’re feeling better!!! X
